Title: Extends the effectiveness of certain provisions of the coordinated construction act for lower Manhattan and certain other provisions relating to joint bidding on contracts for public work projects
Summary: Extends the effectiveness of certain provisions of the coordinated construction act for lower Manhattan and certain other provisions relating to joint bidding on contracts for public work projects.
LawCode: Amd §5, Chap 259 of 2004; amd §7, Chap 322 of 2014
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the Coordinated Construction Act for Lower Manhattan and chapter 322 of the laws of 2014, relating to joint bidding on contracts for public work contracts, in relation to extending the effectiveness thereof
